title: Open Clinical Trials | Sanford Health
description: Use this page to search all trials that are open to enrollment for adult and pediatric patients.
cleaned_text: View All Open Clinical Trials Use this page to search all trials that are open to enrollment for adult and pediatric patients. For more information on clinical trials at Sanford Health, call or email Bemidji Clinical Research at [(218) 333-4869](tel:1-218-333-4869), Bismarck Clinical Research at [(701) 323-5760](tel:1-701-323-5760), Fargo at 234-2383](tel:701-234-2383); and Sioux Falls Clinical Research at [(605) 328-1368](tel:1-605-328-1368). You can also learn more by visiting [clinicaltrials.gov](https://clinicaltrials.gov/), which is a comprehensive national registry of all clinical trials.
